18#include "DMDefaultPlacement.h"
19#include "ByteArray.h"
20
21#include <cstdint>
22#include <vector>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25namespace DataMatrix {
26
27BitMatrix DefaultPlacement::Place(const ByteArray& codewords, int numCols, int numRows)
28{
29 BitMatrix result(numCols, numRows);
30
31 auto codeword = codewords.begin();
32
33 auto visited = VisitMatrix(numRows, numCols, [&codeword, &result](const BitPosArray& bitPos) {
34 // Places the 8 bits of a corner or the utah-shaped symbol character in the result matrix
35 uint8_t mask = 0x80;
36 for (auto& p : bitPos) {
37 if (*codeword & mask)
38 result.set(p.col, p.row);
39 mask >>= 1;
40 }
41 ++codeword;
42 });
43
44 if (codeword != codewords.end())
45 return {};
46
47 // Lastly, if the lower righthand corner is untouched, fill in fixed pattern
48 if (!visited.get(numCols - 1, numRows - 1)) {
49 result.set(numCols - 1, numRows - 1);
50 result.set(numCols - 2, numRows - 2);
51 }
52
53 return result;
54}
55
56} // DataMatrix
57} // ZXing
58
